Articles Title: Mukesh Ambani's son Akash Ambani to wed Shloka Mehta this year?
Articles Description: Akash is the eldest son of India’s richest man Mukesh Ambani, and Shloka Mehta is the daughter of Russell Mehta, the head of Rosy Blue Diamonds

Articles Title: Aurobindo Pharma unit gets 9 observations from USFDA
Articles Description: Aurobindo Pharma shares fall nearly 4% to Rs600.80 after the company says USFDA issues Form 483 with nine observations to the company’s unit 4 in Hyderabad

Articles Title: UIDAI asks telcos to provide facility for users to know SIMs linked to Aadhaar
Articles Description: The decision was taken after the UIDAI came to know about some retailers, operators and agents of telecom companies allegedly misusing Aadhaar authentication facility to issue new SIMs.

Articles Title: Anil Ambani's Reliance Infra slaps Rs 5440 crore arbitration notice against Pipavav Defence promoters
Articles Description: The agreements were signed by both the companies during the acquisition Pipavav Defence in March 4, 2014. Reliance Infrastructure's subsidiary Reliance Defence Systems Private Ltd had initially bought about 18 per cent stake in Pipavav Defence and Engineer

Articles Title: Top officials likely to share all details of 80:20 gold scheme with PAC
Articles Description: The move comes after BJP members of the panel alleged that the scheme, which was started during the tenure of Congress leader P Chidambaram as finance minister, was misused by jewellers including fugitive Mehul Choksi for money laundering.

Articles Title: Aircel seeks appointment of IRP to expedite process of clearing employee dues
Articles Description: Aircel, which has filed for bankruptcy, approaches Mumbai bench of National Company Law Tribunal for the appointment of an IRP

Articles Title: Indian industry braces for flood of Chinese steel following US tariff hike
Articles Description: US trade deficit with China is $375 bn, or 46% of its total; If Trump forces his way, China could look at markets such as India to offload its products

Articles Title: TDS scam: 447 companies robbed taxman of Rs 3200 crore, says report
Articles Description: Tax season is yet to really pick up pace in the country but tax scams are already hogging the headlines. Last month it was a refund fraud totalling Rs 5 crore in Bangalore.

Articles Title: Services Industry Contracts In February As Inflation Hits Demand, Says Survey
Articles Description: In February, manufacturers also faced accelerating inflation, pushing overall input prices to rise at their quickest pace in three and a half years.

Articles Title: Bhushan Power, Jyoti Structures resolution to be delayed as IRPs dragged to court
Articles Description: BDO Restructuring Advisory moves court against IRPs Vandana Garg and Mahender Khandelwal to ensure they complete resolution process of Bhushan Power, Jyoti Structures before they leave the firm

Articles Title: Good news: Railways may cut ticket prices of luxury trains by 50%
Articles Description: The revenue for two of the luxury trains – Palace of Wheels and Royal Rajasthan – which are operated by both Indian Railways and Rajasthan Tourism, have reportedly declined by more than 24 per cent and 63 per cent respectively.

Articles Title: 7th Pay Commission: Will The Government Increase Minimum Basic Pay to Rs 21000 With Fitment Factor 3 Times?
Articles Description: Seventh Pay Commission: 7th pay commission's recommendations had not gone down well with the employees. They were demanding that the minimum salary under 7th CPC must be spiked to Rs 26,000 with a fitment factor of 3.68 times.

Articles Title: Essar Steel auction: A perception game plays out in the public
Articles Description: Both ArcelorMittal and Numetal push their cases as an all-important meeting in the auction takes place this week

Articles Title: EESL To Invest Over ₹ 10000 Crore In Andhra Pradesh; Produce 1 Lakh Electric Vehicles
Articles Description: Once the MoU is signed between EESL and the Andhra Pradesh state government, the move could see employment to over 1.05 lakh persons in state.

Articles Title: PNB, Canara and three other banks likely to be put under RBI's prompt corrective action: ICRA
Articles Description: Having posted mounting losses during the last three years, 11 out of the 21 public-sector banks (PSBs) have already been placed under the Prompt Corrective Action (PCA) framework by the Reserve Bank of India.

Articles Title: View: With Bollywood lost, banks can't stop mobile juggernaut
Articles Description: A recent Bernstein survey has some sobering news for India's banks: They may have already lost Bollywood, and they can't hope to win the neighborhood grocer.

Articles Title: How India beat China to regain top slot among fastest growing economies
Articles Description: India's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) grew at 7.2%, rebounding sharply from a three-year low just six months ago, and beating China to regain the fastest growing economy spot in the October-December period of the year 2017. Here's why

Articles Title: Closing Bell: Sensex falls 300 pts, Nifty ends below 10400; Tata Motors top loser
Articles Description: Hindalco, Tata Motors, Tata Steel, Aurobindo Pharma, Ambuja Cements, Reliance Industries, Vedanta, HUL, ITC and L&T were down 1-4 percent.

Articles Title: PNB fraud: NCLT bars Nirav Modi, Mehul Choksi from selling assets
Articles Description: The NCLT has issued orders restraining Nirav Modi, Mehul Choksi and 60-dd entities from selling their assets so that the government can recover funds siphoned off by them in the Rs 12,600 crore PNB fraud.

Articles Title: Railways plans Rs 10 lakh-crore high-speed train corridors
Articles Description: Indian Railways has set rolling the mother of all overhauls. The jumbo plan, to be rolled out in April, will give all big cities a 200 km an hour lifeline.
